component_text.text: This action will become available after the cooldown has expired.
Gain more Favour with the Phoenix King to be able to occupy more positions.
You can perform the action as soon as this Lord is no longer wounded.
You have insufficient [[img:icon_influence]][[/img]]Influence to perform this action
This province capital must be owned by a High Elf faction for its Patronage to be available.
All settlements in the province need to be owned by a High Elf faction.

Sea Lord Aislinn's faction doesn't gain any territories when confederating. Instead, the confederated faction's territories are granted to the High Elf faction {{CcoCampaignFaction:NameWithIcon}}. Aislinn will retain all Sea Patrol Outposts built in those territories.
This position is taken by another faction. Usurping it will worsen the diplomatic relationship between you.
When occupied, this position grants the owner:
To activate, at least 1 settlement in the province needs to be owned by a High Elf faction.
Take this patronage to perform this action
